price: 72.Nabiyow isin edde Qataataktan digaalak tu siinih xayyowtam takkeh keenik (koros kinnuk) ixxic.
arabic: قُلۡ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعۡضُ ٱلَّذِي تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qul ʿasā an yakūna radifa lakum baʿḍu alladhī tastaʿjilūna
